targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (soc_percent)::int AS "Battery %",
  CASE 
    WHEN ts > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' THEN 'current'
    ELSE 'stale'
  END as data_freshness
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND soc_percent IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  COALESCE(watts_in_sum, 0) AS "Input Power",
  COALESCE(watts_out_sum, 0) AS "Output Power"
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE
  device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND (watts_in_sum IS NOT NULL OR watts_out_sum IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  'Battery' as "Category",
  'State of Charge' as "Parameter",
  (soc_percent)::text || '%' as "Value",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int as "Update Age",
  ts as "Last Update"
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND soc_percent IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Battery',
  'State of Health',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.soh')::text || '%',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'bmsMaster.soh'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Battery',
  'Voltage',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.vol')::float / 1000)::text || 'V',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'bmsMaster.vol'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Battery',
  'Current',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.amp')::float / 1000)::text || 'A',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'bmsMaster.amp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Battery',
  'Temperature',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.temp')::text || '°C',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'bmsMaster.temp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Battery',
  'Remain Time',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'pd.remainTime')::float / 60)::text || ' hours',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'pd.remainTime'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Power',
  'Input Total',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'pd.wattsInSum')::text || 'W',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND watts_in_sum IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Power',
  'Output Total',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'pd.wattsOutSum')::text || 'W',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND watts_out_sum IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Solar',
  'Input Power',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.inWatts')::text || 'W',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.inWatts'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Solar',
  'Input Voltage',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.inVol')::float / 1000)::text || 'V',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.inVol'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Solar',
  'Input Current',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.inAmp')::float / 1000)::text || 'A',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.inAmp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Solar',
  'MPPT Temperature',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.mpptTemp')::text || '°C',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.mpptTemp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Inverter',
  'Output Power',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'inv.outputWatts')::text || 'W',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'inv.outputWatts'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Inverter',
  'AC Input Voltage',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'inv.acInVol')::float / 1000)::text || 'V',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'inv.acInVol'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Inverter',
  'AC Output Voltage',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'inv.invOutVol')::float / 1000)::text || 'V',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'inv.invOutVol'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Inverter',
  'AC Frequency',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'inv.acInFreq')::text || 'Hz',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'inv.acInFreq'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Inverter',
  'Temperature',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'inv.outTemp')::text || '°C',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'inv.outTemp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'DC Output',
  'Car Port Voltage',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.carOutVol')::float / 10)::text || 'V',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.carOutVol'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'DC Output',
  'Car Port Current',
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.carOutAmp')::float / 10)::text || 'A',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'mppt.carOutAmp'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'DC Output',
  'Car Port Power',
  (raw_data->'params'->>'pd.carWatts')::text || 'W',
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - ts))::int,
  ts
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE device_sn = '$device_sn' AND raw_data->'params' ? 'pd.carWatts'
ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

ORDER BY 1, 2

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  (raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.temp')::int AS "Battery",
  (raw_data->'params'->>'inv.outTemp')::int AS "Inverter",
  (raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.mpptTemp')::int AS "MPPT"
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE
  device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'bmsMaster.vol')::float / 1000) AS "Battery",
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'inv.acInVol')::float / 1000) AS "AC Input",
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'inv.invOutVol')::float / 1000) AS "AC Output",
  ((raw_data->'params'->>'mppt.inVol')::float / 1000) AS "Solar Input"
FROM ecoflow_measurements
WHERE
  device_sn = '$device_sn'
  AND ts BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY ts

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT device_sn FROM ecoflow_measurements ORDER BY device_sn
list.name: device_sn
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_sn FROM ecoflow_measurements ORDER BY device_sn
